snippet: Same-sex couples married during a brief period when gay marriage was allowed in Utah can jointly file state taxes, the State Tax Commission said Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Same-sex couples married during a brief period when gay marriage was allowed in Utah can jointly file state taxes, the State Tax Commission said Thursday.

headline.main: Utah: Joint Returns for Some Gay Couples
headline.print_headline: Utah: Joint Returns For Some Gay Couples

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
